thread.title: Video: MS Dhoni wins over Virat Kohli, Chennai fans
thread.title_full: Video: MS Dhoni wins over Virat Kohli, Chennai fans

author: Deccan
title: Video: MS Dhoni wins over Virat Kohli, Chennai fans
text:
Deccan Chronicle/PTI | October 23, 2015, 12.06 MS Dhoni made sure Kohli’s match-winning contribution gets appreciated and hence, handed over the stump to him following India's 35-run win over South Africa. (Photo: PTI) Chennai: Playing at his adopted home ground, MS Dhoni led India to a series-levlling win in the fourth ODI against South Africa here on Thursday. While the skipper could not contribute much with the bat, that did not stop him winning hearts of Chennai fans.
As the team was approaching dressing room following its 35-run win, Dhoni, uprooted a stump as a memory of the victory. What he did later was perhaps a great sign to squash all the rumours of friction between him and Virat Kohli.
Although India’s Test skipper could not take the field due to cramps following his 137-run knock, Dhoni made sure Kohli’s match-winning contribution gets appreciated and hence, handed over the stump to him.
It's 2-2! MS Dhoni takes a stump. Hands it over to Virat. Well done, boys. #INDvsSA
Posted by Indian Cricket Team on Thursday, 22 October 2015 Later, India’s World Cup winning skipper lauded Kohli’s effort with the bat saying, “Virat batted exceedingly well and assessed the conditions well."
Tags: Cricket india vs south africa MS Dhoni Virat Kohli Chennai ODI Also Read Video: MS Dhoni praises Virat Kohli's match-winning performance in Chennai Ind vs SA, 4th ODI: Virat Kohli's 138 stars as hosts dominate Proteas, level series 2-2 Video: Modest MS Dhoni credits bowlers for Indore ODI win, calls it team effort
